page.title: 11SHOPPING
page.content: The shops go down both sides of the street.There are two modern precincts,one either side,the Forum and the Roman square.Vandals prove a problem in the Forum but the police cannot shut it off every night for it is a public right of way.Shop owners have turned to employing security guards.Ten shops on the last count are closed.The market takes place in the old cattle market every Friday and Saturday.Most people like the shops being close together and there is good parking space.The elderly would like to see the derelict shops to be re-opened eg.Marks and Spencers,C.and A. etc.The elderly don't use the market because of the crowd but the parents use it regularly.
